page.title: 14Religion in West Enfield.
page.content: To attend places of worship is no longer an important part of the lives of the majority of people.Places of worship are used for funerals, and weddings and baptism in that order. The large Cypriot immigrant group go out of area to attend their own churches etc: Church of England: 1.St.Thomas'Church.Prince George Ave. N.14. 2.St.Mary Magdelere.Windmill Hill. Enfield. Roman Catholic: Christ the King.Bramley Rd. Cockfosters. Jewish Faith: Southgate Progressive Synagogue. 75 Close Rd.N.14. Cockfosters and North Southgate Synagogue.Old Farm Ave. N.14.
